title: Tommaso：已修复逆天刷物品BUG
author: 北美路人
txt_content:
本帖最后由 熄灭的火把 于 2015-2-11 19:26 编辑 

Tommaso：


I just went back and drop-in replaced MCPE's lockless queue with the one I used for my prototype, nothing's gonna break at all!


我刚刚回去检查更换了我原型的MCPE无锁嵌入式队列，游戏不会再崩坏了。


This new one fixes a couple of ugly hacks, let's hope it will also fix that couple of random crashes we had...


新修复了几个作弊漏洞，我也希望它也顺带修复了随机崩溃。


MCPE0.10.4 作弊演示：http://v.youku.com/v_show/id_XODkxMDIxMjE2.html
